article_html:
The offer

Enjoy up to 25% of the Guardian and Observer

Simply complete the form below and we’ll send you (via post) two weeks of exclusive discount vouchers entitling you to £0.40 off the Guardian Monday to Friday, £0.70 off the Saturday’s Guardian and £0.90 off the Observer.

Redeem the vouchers at any participating retailer or newsagent.

Offer closes 15 May.


Terms and conditions

  1. This offer (the “Offer”) is open to residents of the UK aged 18 and over.
  2. All applicants for the Offer (“Applicant” or “you”) shall be deemed to have accepted these Terms and Conditions.
  3. To apply for discount vouchers you must complete your details in the form above and submit the form as instructed. No purchase is necessary. If you have any questions about how to enter or otherwise in connection with the Offer, please email us at promotions@guardian.co.uk with “Online voucher Offer” in the subject line.
  4. Only one application for vouchers per household. You are responsible for the cost (if any) of sending your voucher application to us.
  5. GNM accepts no responsibility for voucher applications that are lost, delayed, misdirected or incomplete or cannot be delivered or entered for any technical or other reason. Proof of delivery of a voucher application is not proof of receipt by GNM.
  6. The Offer opens at 00:01 on 16 April 2015 and closes at 23:59 on 15 May 2015. Voucher applications received outside this time period will not be processed.
  7. If you submit a valid application for discount vouchers in accordance with these Terms and Conditions GNM will send you 14 discount vouchers: 2x £0.70 off the Guardian on Saturday, 2x £0.90 off the Observer, and 10x £0.40 off the weekday Guardian.
  8. Vouchers will be sent to Applicants on or before the first day printed on the vouchers.
  9. Vouchers are redeemable in the UK only against copies of the Guardian and/or The Observer (as applicable) in any participating retailer or newsagent.
  10. Once the date on a voucher has passed, the voucher will no longer be valid and you will not be able to redeem it for a copy of the Guardian and/or the Observer, as applicable. Please keep your vouchers in a safe place before redeeming them as GNM cannot accept liability for lost vouchers.
  11. The Offer/vouchers may not be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion.
  12. Vouchers are non-exchangeable, non-transferable and not redeemable for cash or other monetary value.
  13. GNM shall use and take care of any personal information you supply to it as described in its privacy policy, a copy of which can be seen at http://www.guardian.co.uk/help/privacy-policy, and in accordance with data protection legislation. By submitting a voucher application, you agree to the collection, retention, usage and distribution of your personal information in order to process and contact you about your voucher application and for marketing purposes (where you have consented to the same).
  14. GNM may pass applicants’ details to third parties and/or otherwise engage third party providers in connection with this Offer where the third party is acting on GNM’s behalf for the purposes of administering this Offer, and/or for the purposes of sending you GNM’s marketing materials; and/or as otherwise required by law.
  15. GNM accepts no responsibility for any damage, loss, liabilities, injury or disappointment incurred or suffered by you as a result of applying for the Offer or accepting the vouchers. GNM further disclaims liability for any injury or damage to your or any other person’s computer relating to or resulting from participation in or downloading any materials in connection with the Offer. Nothing in these Terms and Conditions shall exclude the liability of GNM under law for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation, or for death or personal injury resulting from its negligence
  16. GNM reserves the right at any time and from time to time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, this Offer with or without prior notice due to reasons outside its reasonable control (including, without limitation, in the case of anticipated, suspected or actual fraud). The decision of GNM in all matters relating to the Offer is final and no correspondence will be entered into.
  17. GNM shall not be liable for any failure to comply with its obligations relating to this Offer where the failure is caused by something outside its reasonable control.
  18. The Offer and these Terms and Conditions will be governed by English law and voucher applicants submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English courts.
  19. Promoter: Guardian News & Media Limited, Kings Place, 90 York Way, London, N1 9GU.

title: Sign up and receive up to 25% off the Guardian and Observer
